snippet: The lack of confrontations in Tampa this week was a far cry from the last few Republican conventions, which saw hundreds of arrests and dozens of lawsuits against the police.
abstract: Lack of confrontations between police and protesters outside the Republican National Convention in Tampa, Fla, stands in stark contrast to the last few Republican conventions, which saw hundreds of arrests and dozens of lawsuits against the police.
lead_paragraph: The lack of confrontations in Tampa this week was a far cry from the last few Republican conventions, which saw hundreds of arrests and dozens of lawsuits against the police.

headline.seo: For Police and Protesters, a Quieter Convention
headline.main: For the Police and Protesters, a Quieter Convention
headline.print_headline: For the Police and Protesters, a Quieter Convention
